Talk_43:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>If I was able to get you some, I'd clearly
have done it by now!

I checked out the <clr:0000>caves past the cart
tracks<clr:ffff>, just like you told me. I couldn't
get at anything.
<sp:3:0:2:0900>You know places like that are way too
dangerous for a Hylian like me!
Talk_72:
<sp:3:0:2:0500>Hang on. Looks like your pouch is full.


<sp:3:0:2:0700>I want to give you a large Zonai charge,
so come back once you've made room.
Talk_45:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:TalkPositive_00>Not my problem, and I don't want that
hunka junk. I'm not lettin' you off the
hook till ya get me a <clr:0000>rock roast<clr:ffff>.
Talk_74:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I wanna give you something to thank you.
Did you make space?
Talk_46:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>Look, I'm sorry I wasted it.<clr:0000><sp:0:4:0><clr:ffff>But askin' me to bring you another
<clr:0000>rock roast <clr:ffff>isn't reasonable.

How about <clr:0000>this <clr:ffff>instead?<sp:0:4:0><snd:Think_00>These <clr:0000>mysterious things <clr:ffff>were only
discovered after the Upheaval.

It looks a little strange, I know, but
it's a hard curio to come by.
Talk_75:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Wearing <clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff> as a fashion
accessory, eh? I love it.

But I don't have much use for it like that.
I only work with raw, organic foods.
Talk_76:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Wearing <clr:0000>rock roast<clr:ffff> as a fashion
accessory, eh? I love it.

But I don't have much use for it like that.
I only work with raw, organic foods.
Talk_48:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_00>Rock roast <clr:ffff>is in short supply and high
demand round here. Everyone wants
it—I've barely been keepin' up!
Talk_77:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Great! Please take this as a token of
my gratitude.
Talk_78:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I wanna give you a large Zonai charge, so
come back when you've made space in
your pouch.
Talk_51:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Were you Gorons always this thick?


Any way you slice it, <clr:0000>this <clr:ffff>is worth more
than one <clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>.

Guess I've got no choice but to try those
<clr:0000>caves past the cart tracks <clr:ffff>again.

<snd:Think>But how am I supposed to get past
the lava?
Talk_54:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>That <sp:5:0:0>marbled rock roast! <sp:5:0:0>Would you trade
it for this?
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:TalkPositive>What, another Hylian? No service for
Hylians right now. No exceptions.

You can blame this guy. He went and let a
precious <clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff> go to waste.
Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>That <sp:5:0:0>rock roast! <sp:5:0:0>Would you trade it
for this?
Talk_56:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01>Lettin' our hottest commodity go to
waste is unforgivable!

You can make up for it by bringing me a
fresh <clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>.

Now get that THING out of my sight.
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:TalkPositive>What, another Hylian? No service for
Hylians right now. No exceptions.

You can blame this guy. He went and let a
precious <clr:0000>rock roast<clr:ffff> go to waste.

Guess I've got no choice but to try those

<snd:Think>But how am I supposed to get past

Talk_59:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Wait. <sp:5:0:0>Hold on a second.


<sp:3:0:2:0200>I have no use for a roast in that state.
I only work with raw, organic foods.

If you're going to bother helping, then
bring me a proper <clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>.
Talk_60:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Wait. <sp:5:0:0>Hold on a second.


<sp:3:0:2:0200>I have no use for a roast in that state.
I only work with raw, organic foods.

If you're going to bother helping, then
bring me a proper <clr:0000>rock roast<clr:ffff>.
Talk_61:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:TalkPositive>So until somebody brings me a
<clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>, I'm not offerin'
nothin' to Hylians.
Talk_62:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:TalkPositive>So until somebody brings me a <clr:0000>rock roast<clr:ffff>,
I'm not offerin' nothin' to Hylians.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Anyway. I've got nothin' to feed you
Hylians with. So scram.
Talk_63:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>Mmm, yes. Rock roast. Best thing since
sliced rock.

It's the most delectable of rocks—crucial
to Goron survival!

<clr:0000>I laid cart tracks to the caves <clr:ffff>so we'd be
able to pull in a big haul of it.

But it's risky even for us Gorons to try to
gather it.
Talk_65:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:ffff>So long as I've got <clr:0000>marbled rock roasts<clr:ffff>,
I've got no complaints.
Talk_66:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Phew. Helped me out of a bind there.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>Y'see, I'm a meat man. When I heard
this place served a roast to die for,
I came running.
Little did I know the meat here is
actually rocks.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>This isn't meat or a rock, but it's the
rarest thing I own. <sp:5:0:0>Take it with my thanks.
Talk_67:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>Oh, before you go. Have you heard about
the <clr:0000>rumored beast<clr:ffff>?

If that creature's really out there, I'm
gonna find out if it's edible.

When ya love meat, it's just what ya do.


Figure I'll hit the stables to ask around
for leads.

<sp:3:0:2:0800>By the way, we're not strangers anymore,
buddy.<sp:5:1:0> If you see me out there in the
wilds, gimme a shout!
Until then, take care.
Talk_39:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>Look, I'm sorry I wasted it.<clr:0000><sp:0:4:0><clr:ffff>But askin' me to bring you another

It is the most delectable of rocks—crucial

<sp:3:0:2:0901>But now the delivery guy is slacking off,
